title: INVENTORY / PHOTO OF TATTOOS
description: instant photo of the hanged man's tattoos by Kim Kitsuragi

dialogueTree.title: Photo of Tattoos: "An intricate web of blue lines stre..."
dialogueTree.english: An intricate web of blue lines stretches across the torso of the hanged man, from the right shoulder to the solar plexus. Each time the lines intersect, a small white star is formed in their crossing. Hundreds of fading asterisks riddle his skin; their concentration is highest around his heart.
dialogueTree.polish: Na korpusie wisielca widnieje misterna pajęczyna z niebieskich linii. Od prawego barku po splot słoneczny – za każdym razem, kiedy się krzyżują, tworzą małą, białą gwiazdę. Skóra pokryta jest setkami blednących gwiazdek. Najwięcej widać ich w okolicy serca.
dialogueTree.belarusian: На корпусе шыбеніка віднее мудра павуціна з блакітных ліній. Ад правага пляча да сонечнага спляцення — кожны раз, калі яны перасякаюцца, утвараюць маленькую белую зорку. Скура пакрыта сотнямі змарнелых зорак. Найбольш іх відаць у раёне сэрца.

links.title: Photo of Tattoos: "It still kind of looks like a map o..."
links.english: It still kind of looks like a map of the stars in the night sky, but... something's not right.
links.polish: Nadal wygląda to trochę jak mapa gwiazd na nocnym niebie, ale... coś jest nie tak.
links.belarusian: Гэта ўсё яшчэ крыху падобна на карту зорак на начным небе, але... нешта не так.

links.title: You: "What's the meaning of this tattoo?"
links.english: What's the meaning of this tattoo?

links.title: Photo of Tattoos: "For you to discover. You've gotten..."
links.english: For you to discover. You've gotten as far as you will without assistance.
links.polish: Musisz to odkryć. Nic więcej nie odkryjesz bez pomocy.
links.belarusian: Ты павінен гэта выявіць. Больш нічога не выявіш без дапамогі.

links.title: Suggestion: "Someone close to the victim might k..."
links.english: Someone close to the victim might know.
links.polish: Ktoś bliżej związany z ofiarą może wiedzieć więcej.
links.belarusian: Хтосьці бліжэй звязаны з ахвярай можа ведаць больш.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Someone who knows about history cou..."
links.english: Someone who knows about history could tell you.
links.polish: Ktoś znający historię mógłby ci coś powiedzieć.
links.belarusian: Хтось, хто ведае гісторыю, мог бы табе нешта расказаць.

links.title: Photo of Tattoos: "It almost looks like the electronic..."
links.english: It almost looks like the electronic patterns inside a radiocomputer or an old filament memory, but not quite.
links.polish: Wygląda to podobnie jak elektroniczne wzory w radiokomputerze lub starej pamięci włosowatej, lecz nie identycznie.
links.belarusian: Гэта выглядае падобна да электронных узораў у радыёкамп'ютары або старой валаконнай памяці, але не ідэнтычна.

links.title: Photo of Tattoos: "The pattern still kind of has an et..."
links.english: The pattern still kind of has an ethnic feel to it, but nothing familiar...
links.polish: Wzór wydaje się mieć jak gdyby etniczne pochodzenie, z niczym ci się jednak nie kojarzy...
links.belarusian: Узор здаецца быццам мае этнічнае паходжанне, але ні з чым у цябе не асацыюецца...

links.title: Photo of Tattoos: "It could be anything... religious s..."
links.english: It could be anything... religious symbols, a road map. It could even be purely decorative. Who knows?
links.polish: To może być cokolwiek... Symbole religijne, mapa drogowa. Może też być zwykłą ozdobą. Kto wie?
links.belarusian: Гэта можа быць што заўгодна... Рэлігійныя сімвалы, дарожная карта. Гэта таксама можа быць звычайным упрыгожваннем. Хто ведае?
